title: Got S but no chest pls help
body: So I recently got an S as Riven,Yasuo and Lux but no chest, how come? On my profile it say's I have place for 3 more chest's but nothing. Also my premade got a chest from my S but not me, (I have to mention that I was previously banned for 14 days so maybe it has to do something with that?). Any thoughts on what to do?{{sticker:sg-soraka}}

replies.body: It does look like you're not getting chests due to that recent punishment. That 2-week dropped you to Honor Rank 0 which will lock your hextech loot rewards. Once you've played enough games to show reform from the action that got you punished you'll be able to get loot rewards again.
I know i'm late, but about how many games, and does honor received affect the rate at which your honor unlocks?
Ah so that's it. Thanks a lot :){{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
Is your honor level 0? I know that can stop you from getting chests.
Yup... I thought it was a bug or something but at least now I know the reason.
